profile.greeting: Welcome to Original Coast Clothing {{userName}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience. If you want to build a similar one visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc-ig

private_reply.post: Thanks for liking our post! This is as far as the demo goes. In a production experience, this message would come from a human agent. See https://fb.me/get-sample-oc-ig to learn how to build a similar experience.
private_reply.shirt: Glad that you liked the shirt! Let us know if we can help you find the perfect fit :)

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userName}}! Welcome to Original Coast Clothing where you'll find styles for every occasion.
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the features
get_started.help: What we can do to help you today?

curation.prompt: Hello {{userName}}, we have some exciting new products out, which product line do you want to learn more about?
curation.occasion: Great! Let's get started. First, is there an occasion in mind?
curation.title: Summer collection 2021
curation.subtitle: Featured outfit
curation.anything_else: Can I help you with anything else?
curation.product_information: We use popular as well as hard-to-find eco-friendly and organic cotton thread.

order.prompt: We'll be happy to help you. Select from the following
order.number: Thanks for reaching out! We're happy to help. Can you please confirm your order number?
order.status: Your order is on it’s way, expect to have it in 3 days.

care.prompt: Hi {{userName}}, how can we help you today?
care.issue: Hi {{userName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you with any questions you might have about your {{topic}}.
care.default: Hi {{userName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I'm here to assist you today. How can I help you?
care.style: Hi {{userName}}, my name is {{agentFirstName}}, I’m here to answer questions you might have on our summer styles
care.end: This is as far as the demo goes. Leverage the power of the Instagram platform for your business. See https://fb.me/get-sample-oc-ig to learn how to build a similar experience.

survey.prompt: Hi, we'd like to get quick feedback on your recent experience with {{agentFirstName}}
survey.neutral: Thanks for the feedback, if there something we should improve feel free to comment with #suggestion
survey.negative: Thanks for telling us. Sorry to hear that, if there something we can do to turn this let us know
survey.suggestion: Your suggestion has been recorded for future review by the team. If this is something we need to get back to you right now just comment "help"

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
